replies.bodyText: The thinking is to use object properties consistently here to be able to represent the state of "no value". I.e. Integer (not int) for font size because it is hard to set a sensible default value/the default value might be client specific. Admittedly, we might want to have bold = false as a default, but again, it might be useful for clients to differentiate between an explicit "no bold" value and no value at all. This is debatable but I was landing on object properties.
replies.author: larshelge
